me.shedaniel.rei.api

Interface DisplayVisibilityHandler


  • public interface DisplayVisibilityHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default float getPriority()
      Gets the priority of the handler
      DisplayVisibility handleDisplay(RecipeCategory category, RecipeDisplay display)
      Handles the visibility of the display.

    • Method Detail

      • getPriority

        default float getPriority()
        Gets the priority of the handler
        Returns:
        the priority

      • handleDisplay

        DisplayVisibility handleDisplay(RecipeCategory category,
                                RecipeDisplay display)
        Handles the visibility of the display. DisplayVisibility.PASS to pass the handling to another handler DisplayVisibility.ALWAYS_VISIBLE to always display it DisplayVisibility.CONFIG_OPTIONAL to allow user to configure the visibility DisplayVisibility.NEVER_VISIBLE to never display it
        Parameters:
        category - the category of the display
        display - the display of the recipe
        Returns:
        the visibility
